page.title: 13HOW MY DAD EARNS HIS LIVING.
page.content: My dad is an artist. He paints landscapes or just messy shapes. He also carves and draws. He has to carve house signs and gravestones to sell so he has enough money to buy paints and brushes. He works at home in the pump room of our very old house. If it is hot he works outside. He gets up about eight o'clock which is fairly early most days. Every afternoon he tries to take Bonny, my puppy, for a walk. So he can't please himself and have a break at any time but he occasionally has the day off. Then he goes to{London}or{Bristol}to sell his paintings to the galleries. He used to run a modelling and painting class. He paints on canvas or on paper in a frame. First of all he sketches on a pad. Usually its things like trees or fields or country scenes. I know he enjoys his work.
